verses.verse: (A Psalm for Thanksgiving.) <S%H7321>Shout<s%> <S%H7321>joyfully<s%> to the <S%H3068>Lord,<s%> <S%H3605>all<s%> the <S%H776>earth.<s%>

<S%H3045>Know<s%> that the <S%H3068>Lord<s%> <S%H1931>Himself<s%> is <S%H430>God;<s%> It is He who has <S%H6213>made<s%> us, and not we <S%H587>ourselves;<s%> [We are] His <S%H5971>people<s%> and the <S%H6629>sheep<s%> of His <S%H4830>pasture.<s%>

<S%H935>Enter<s%> His <S%H8179>gates<s%> with <S%H8426>thanksgiving,<s%> [And] His <S%H2691>courts<s%> with <S%H8416>praise.<s%> <S%H3034>Give<s%> <S%H3034>thanks<s%> to Him; <S%H1288>bless<s%> His <S%H8034>name.<s%>
For the <S%H3068>Lord<s%> is <S%H2896>good;<s%> His <S%H2617>lovingkindness<s%> is <S%H5769>everlasting,<s%> And His <S%H530>faithfulness<s%> to <S%H1755>all<s%> <S%H1755>generations.<s%>
